mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room_info ( room_roomtype, room_service, room_size, room_minper, room_maxper, room_peak, room_semipeak, room_off, accommodationId ) VALUES ( #{roomRoomtype}, #{roomService}, #{roomSize}, #{roomMinper}, #{roomMaxper}, #{roomPeak}, #{roomSemipeak}, #{roomOff}, #{accommodations.accommodationId} )
